sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import sos from '../../res/song1.png'; import moon from '../../res/moon.png'; import './albumsp.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { graphcms, ALBUM_POSTS, options } from '../../graphql/Queries'; const Albumsp = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { graphcms.request(ALBUM_POSTS) .then(res => setPosts(res.posts)) }, []); return (

ALBUM REVIEWS

{posts.length > 0 &&

{posts[0].title}

{posts[0].artist}

{new Date(posts[0].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

{posts[1].title}

{posts[1].artist}

{new Date(posts[1].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

{posts[2].title}

{posts[2].artist}

{new Date(posts[2].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

{posts[3].title}

{posts[3].artist}

{new Date(posts[3].datePublished).toLocaleDateString('en-US', options)}

}
) } export default Albumsp
